snippet.title: 'Keepers of Astraela' Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
'Keepers of Astraela' is a dark fantasy otome visual novel coming to Steam (Windows) and Itch.io (Windows/Mac/Linux) in September this year! Play as Eva, a writer whose characters track her down and enlist her help saving their world from the Darkness.

'Keepers of Astraela' is based on the novel 'Vision' by Wrenna Stone and is developed and produced by GSE Studios.

Game Links:
KoA on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2445090/Keepers_of_Astraela/
KoA on Itch.io: https://gsestudios.itch.io/keepers-of-astraela-demo

Trailer Credits:
Video editor - Gwynne of GSE Studios
Character Art - Royan Arizal
Composer and audio mixer - Rosko Vair
Violin Accompaniment - Abby Meyers

Socials:
GSE Twitter/X: https://twitter.com/theGSEstudios
GSE Studios email: thegsestudios@gmail.com
Rosko Vair: https://roskovair.itch.io
Abby Meyers: https://www.instagram.com/abbyxmeyers/?locale=my
